mapper.sql: SELECT td.truck_task_id truckTaskId, td.id taskDetailId, td.vehicle_no vehicleNo, td.business_type businessType, td.plan_arrive_time estimatedArriveTime, td.actual_arrive_time actualArriveTime, td.orig_org_name || '-' || td.dest_org_name line, td.actual_depart_time departTime, td.vehicle_owner_type vehicleOwnerType, td.status status, td.orig_org_code origDeptCode, td.orig_org_name origDeptName, td.dest_org_code destDeptCode, td.dest_org_name destDeptName, a.platform_code prePlatformCode FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td LEFT JOIN tfr.t_opt_platform_pre_assign a ON a.tfr_ctr_code = td.dest_org_code AND a.truck_task_id = td.truck_task_id AND a.status = 'PRE'
mapper.select:
SELECT td.id FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_truck_task_bill tb ON tb.truck_task_detail_id = td.id AND tb.bill_no = #{handoverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND rownum = 1

SELECT td.id FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_truck_task_bill tb ON tb.truck_task_detail_id = td.id AND tb.bill_no = #{handoverNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND rownum = 1

SELECT MAX(td.truck_task_id) truckTaskId, td.id taskDetailId, MAX(td.vehicle_no) vehicleNo, MAX(td.business_type) businessType, MAX(td.plan_arrive_time) estimatedArriveTime, MAX(td.actual_arrive_time) actualArriveTime, MAX(td.orig_org_name) || '-' || MAX(td.dest_org_name) line, MAX(td.actual_depart_time) departTime, MAX(td.vehicle_owner_type) vehicleOwnerType, MAX(td.status) status, MAX(td.orig_org_code) origDeptCode, MAX(td.orig_org_name) origDeptName, MAX(td.dest_org_code) destDeptCode, MAX(td.dest_org_name) destDeptName, MAX(a.platform_code) prePlatformCode, MAX(s.modify_time) sealCheckTime FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_truck_task_bill tb ON tb.truck_task_detail_id = td.id AND tb.assign_state = 'UNASSIGN' AND tb.bill_level = 1 LEFT JOIN tfr.t_opt_platform_pre_assign a ON a.tfr_ctr_code = td.dest_org_code AND a.truck_task_id = td.truck_task_id AND a.status = 'PRE' LEFT JOIN tfr.t_opt_vehicle_entrance s ON s.truck_task_id = td.truck_task_id AND s.tfr_ctr_code = td.dest_org_code
GROUP BY td.id, td.actual_arrive_time, s.modify_time ORDER BY td.actual_arrive_time DESC, s.modify_time DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT 1 FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_truck_task_bill tb ON tb.truck_task_detail_id = td.id AND tb.assign_state = 'UNASSIGN' AND tb.bill_level = 1
GROUP BY td.id )

SELECT hd.waybill_no waybillNo, hd.handover_weight handoverWeight, hd.handover_volume handoverVolumn, hd.transport_type_code transportTypeCode, td.dest_org_code destDeptCode FROM tfr.t_opt_truck_task_detail td INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_truck_task_bill tb ON td.id = tb.truck_task_detail_id AND tb.bill_type = 'HANDOVER' INNER JOIN tfr.t_opt_handoverbill_detail hd ON tb.bill_no = hd.handover_no INNER JOIN pkp.t_srv_waybill w ON w.waybill_no = hd.waybill_no AND w.product_code not in ('PACKAGE','RCP','EPEP') AND w.active = 'Y' WHERE td.id = #{taskDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT p.platform_code FROM tfr.t_opt_platform_distribute d INNER JOIN bse.t_bas_platform p ON d.platform_no = p.virtual_code AND d.transfer_center_no = p.org_code AND p.active = 'Y' WHERE d.transfer_center_no = #{transferCenterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.vehicle_no = #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND d.create_time >= sysdate - 1.5/24 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tfr.t_opt_platform_distribute (platform_distribute_id, transfer_center_no, transfer_center_name, platform_no, use_start_time, use_end_time, vehicle_model, vehicle_no, status, type, schedule_source, load_task_no, create_time) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferCenterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferCenterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vehicleModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduleSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loadTaskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

INSERT INTO tfr.t_opt_platform_pre_assign (id, truck_task_id, tfr_ctr_code, tfr_ctr_name, platform_code, vehicle_no, use_start_time, use_end_time, status, create_user_code, create_user_name, create_time, modify_user_code, modify_user_name, modify_time) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{truckTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrCtrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfrCtrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
